mapper.select: select count(*) from board where status = 'Y'
select bnum ,cus_num ,service_num ,title ,content ,reg_date ,location ,count ,origin_name ,change_name ,status from board where status='Y' order by bnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into board(bnum, cus_num, service_num, title, location, content, origin_name, change_name) values(seq_board.nextval, #{cusNum}, #{serviceNum}, #{title}, #{location}, #{content}, #{originName}, #{changeName})
mapper.update: update board set count = count+1 where bnum = #{bnum} and status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select bnum ,b.cus_num ,service_num ,title ,content ,reg_date ,location ,count ,origin_name ,change_name ,b.status ,c.name from board b, customer c where b.cus_num = c.cus_num and bnum = #{bnum}
mapper.insert: insert into comments(cnum, bnum, c_content, c_writer, reg_date, type, status) values(seq_com.nextval,#{bnum}, #{cContent}, #{cWriter}, sysdate, #{type}, 'Y')
